description: This table contains hospital account external injury codes information from the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: This column stores the line number in the results of a query. Because multiple external injury codes can be stored in one hospital account, each code will have a unique line number.

columns.name: EXT_INJURY_DX_ID
columns.description: This column stores the system identifier of a external injury code stored in the hospital account.

columns.name: EXT_INJURY_POA_YNU
columns.description:
This column specifies whether each External Cause of Injury Code diagnosis was present on admission. ** Note: this column was deprecated in the Spring 2008 release.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No


Unknown


Clinically Undetermined


Exempt from POA reporting

columns.name: EXT_COMORBIDITY_YN
columns.description:
This column specifies whether the External Cause of Injury Code diagnosis is a non-complication/comorbidity ("N"), complication/comorbidity ("Y") or major complication/comorbidity ("Y"). Note that this column is extracted as an explicit "N" or "Y", where "Y" is used for both complication or comorbidity (CC) and major complication or comorbidity (MCC). The updated column EXT_COMORBIDITY_C can be used to distinguish between CC and MCC diagnoses.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


CC


No


MCC

columns.name: EXT_DX_AFF_DRG_YN
columns.description:
This column specifies whether the External Cause of Injury Code diagnosis affects the diagnosis-related group (DRG) associated with the hospital account. A null value for this column indicates no.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: ECODE_DX_SOI_C_NAME
columns.description:
External Cause of Injury Code diagnosis severity of illness


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Refinement not possible


Minor


Moderate


Major


Extreme


Principal Dx Used for SOI/ROM Calc


Excluded


Duplicate Diagnosis


Excluded Complication of Care

columns.name: ECODE_DX_ROM_C_NAME
columns.description:
External Cause of Injury Code diagnosis risk of mortality


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ECODE_DX_SOI_C_NAME

columns.name: ECODE_DX_EXCLD_YN
columns.description:
External Cause of Injury Code diagnosis exclude from clinical reporting


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: EXT_DX_AFF_DRG_YN

columns.name: ECD_DX_AFCT_SOI_YN
columns.description:
External Cause of Injury Code diagnosis affects severity of illness


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: EXT_DX_AFF_DRG_YN

columns.name: ECD_DX_AFCT_ROM_YN
columns.description:
External Cause of Injury Code diagnosis affects risk of mortality


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: EXT_DX_AFF_DRG_YN

columns.name: ECODE_DX_POA_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores whether each External Cause of Injury Code diagnosis was present on admission. This column links to category table ZC_DX_POA.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: EXT_INJURY_POA_YNU

columns.name: EXT_COMORBIDITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Specifies if complication/comorbidity exists for each External Cause of Injury Code diagnosis on the hospital account.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: EXT_COMORBIDITY_YN

columns.name: ECD_HAC_YN
columns.description:
Specifies if the External Cause of Injury Code diagnosis contributed to a Hospital Acquired Condition.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes
